history.content: you submit anytime in the semester which you finish your declaration requirements, which in this case is the Spring 2020 period.  Regardless of when you submit it, they won't start processing until the end of the quarter and grades have officially gone to the registrar, which might be another week or two after the end of the quarter.  For this year, it took 4-5 weeks to process from the end of the quarter.  It would be in time to get priority for Phase 2 for Fall 2020 at end of July/start of August, but not for the start of Phase 1 for Fall 2020 since Phase 1 starts be in March.  If you get really lucky, it might be finished in time for the very end of Phase 1.

What is the best/earliest time to fill out the declare application form in Spring 2020? How long it will take to process the form (assuming the grade average for 3 classes is > 3.3)? Will I be able to get reserved seat for Fall 2020 as a declared CS major if I submit the form early? Or I'll have to wait till Spring 2021, which is my last semester (hopefully) at Cal? Thank you guys.
history.subject: Declare CS major
